740.source:
function updatePosition() {
    this.updateControlPoint(this.controlPoints[0], this.fromMorph)
    this.updateControlPoint(this.controlPoints[1], this.toMorph)
    this.updateIntersection(this.fromMorph, this.controlPoints[0])
    this.updateIntersection(this.toMorph, this.controlPoints[1])

    this.adjustOrigin(this.bounds().extent().scaleBy(0.5))
}

1661.comment:
A splitter, that exchanges the extent from two morphs.... ok, hard to describe. It's just a splitter.

Inspired by the resize corner, it latebinds into the ui, by placing it ontop two adjacent morphs.
